vote.text: Amendment SA 1002 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1002 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6314) To make a technical correction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1002 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1002 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 948.
